short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension that changes new tab for WHRHS highschool students.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension used to override a new tab to create a custom page to help students at WHRHS. It provides links to the 8 most used links that students use. It also displays the live time and logo. This makes it easier to get work done in school.
